question: Question: Which entities (Disorder, Patient, H-Professional) are present in this text?
text:
Text: "Larrialdi-zerbitzuan zeftriaxona antibioterapia enpirikoarekin hasi zeneta euste-tratamendua egin zen odola, plaketak eta fibrinogenoa transfundituz.
24 orduko epean pazientearen egoera okertu eta heriotza konfirmatu zen."
translation: English translation of the text: "Within 24 hours, the patient's condition deteriorated and death was confirmed. Supportive treatment was performed with blood, platelets and fibrinogen transfusions."

question: Question: Which entities (Disorder, Patient, H-Professional) are present in this text?
text: Text: "Ohiko odol analisi batean PSAren igoera atzeman ostean, familia-medikuak urologoarengana bideratu zuen."
translation: English translation of the text: "After detecting an increase in PSA in a routine blood test, the family doctor referred him to a urologist."

Text: "GAUR EGUNEKO GAIXOTASUNA
Pazientea bertaratzeko arrazoiak: 2 asteko eboluzioko eztula eta espektorazio zornetsua; eta, duela 4 egunetatik, disnea basala areagotu eta ahalegin minimoengatik ere gertatzen zaio."
translation: English translation of the text: "Reasons for the patient's presentation: 2-week history of cough and mucus-producing sputum; and, since 4 days ago, he has had increased basal dyspnea, even with minimal exertion."

question: Question: Which entities (Disorder, Patient, H-Professional) are present in this text?
text: Text: "Lehen aldiz eta inoren laguntzarik gabe psikiatraren kontsultara zorabioengatik datorren 40 urteko gizona da."
translation: English translation of the text: "A 40-year-old man who comes to the psychiatrist's office for the first time and without anyone's help because of dizziness."

question: Question: Which entities (Disorder, Patient, H-Professional) are present in this text?

text: Text: "Nekanek bikotearekin harreman toxikoa du, bere familiak ez ulertzen ez duena."

question: Question: Which entities (Disorder, Patient, H-Professional) are present in this text?
text:
Text: "Ebakuntza-barneko balorazioa
Abdomen-barrunbea zabalduta, 2500 ml-ko debito hematikoa aurkitzen da; erretroperotoneoa askatzean, zirujauek ikusten dute aorta abdominala guztiz apurtuta, odoljario masiboa."
translation: English translation of the text: "When the abdominal cavity is opened, a blood loss of 2500 ml is found; Upon release of the retroperitoneum, surgeons observe a complete rupture of the abdominal aorta, massive bleeding."
